==Translingual== ===Etymology=== From {{der|mul|is|himbrimi||surf roarer}} ===Noun=== {{head|mul|noun}} # A bird in genus ''{{m|mul|Gavia}}''. ====Derived terms==== * ''[[Gavia immer]]'' ---- ==Dutch== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|nl|dum|immer||always}}, from {{inh|nl|odt|iomer||always}}. From {{compound|nl|ie|meer|t1=always|t2=more}}. Related to {{m|nl|ieder}}, {{m|nl|iemand}}, {{m|nl|iets}}, {{m|nl|ooit}}. Cognate with {{cog|de|immer}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{audio|nl|Nl-immer.ogg|Audio}} * {{rhyme|nl|ɪmər}} ===Adverb=== {{nl-adv}} # {{lb|nl|formal}} [[always]] ====Synonyms==== * {{l|nl|altijd}} * {{l|nl|altoos}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|nl|immers}} ====See also==== * {{l|nl|eeuwig}} * {{l|nl|voorgoed}} [[Category:Dutch indefinite adverbs]] ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{der|de|gmh|immer}} (also {{m|gmh|iemer}}, {{m|gmh|imer}}), from {{der|de|goh|iomer|iomēr|always}}. From {{compound|goh|io|mer|alt2=mēr||t1=always|t2=more|nocat=1}}. Cognate with {{cog|nl|immer}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈɪmɐ/}} * {{audio|de|De-at-immer.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-immer.ogg|Audio}} ===Adverb=== {{de-adv}} # [[always]] ## at all times without exception ##: {{ux|de|Irgendwo scheint '''immer''' die Sonne.|The sun is '''always''' shining somewhere.}} ## very often; all the time; [[constantly]] ##: {{ux|de|Er will '''immer''' nur fernsehen.|He just wants to watch telly '''all the time'''.}} ## every time; whenever some precondition is given ##: {{ux|de|Er erzählt '''immer''' dieselbe Geschichte.|He '''always''' tells that same story.}} # {{lb|de|with [[Appendix:Glossary#comparative|comparative]]}} [[more and more]] #: {{uxi|de|Es wird '''immer''' kälter.|It's getting colder and colder.}} # {{lb|de|colloquial|unstressed}} {{non-gloss definition|used to emphasize another adverb of time, which itself is stressed}} #: {{ux|de|Er kommt '''immer''' nie pünktlich.|He’s never on time.|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|Ich bin oft '''immer''' sehr vergesslich.|I’m often very forgetful.|inline=1}} #: {{ux|de|Manchmal hab ich '''immer''' das Gefühl, dass...|Sometimes I get the feeling that...|inline=1}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|at all times}} {{l|de|stets}} {{q|but somewhat uncommon in this sense}}; {{l|de|allzeit}} {{q|dated, poetic}} * {{sense|very often}} {{l|de|stets}} {{q|formal}}; {{l|de|dauernd}}; {{l|de|ständig}}; {{l|de|immerzu}} * {{sense|every time}} {{l|de|stets}} {{q|formal}}; {{l|de|[[jedes]] [[Mal]]}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|immer gleich}} * {{l|de|immer noch}} * {{l|de|immer wieder}} * {{l|de|immer wenn}} ===See also=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! probability !! 100 % !! 90 % !! 50 % !! 10 % !! 0 % |- | Adverb || {{l|de|immer}}|| {{l|de|meistens}} || {{l|de|manchmal}} || {{l|de|selten}} || {{l|de|nie}} |} * {{l|de|ewig}} ---- ==German Low German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|nds-de|gml|immer}}, {{m|gml|imber}}, {{m|gml|iemmer}}, {{m|gml|jummer}}, {{m|gml|iemer}}, {{m|gml|imer}}, from {{inh|nds-de|osx|iomēr}}, {{m|osx|eomēr}}, equivalent to {{compound|nds-de|je|mehr}}. ===Adverb=== {{head|nds-de|adverb}} # [[always]]; [[forever]] ====Synonyms==== * {{l|nds-de|alltied}} ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/ˈimɐ/}} ===Adverb=== {{head|hrx|adverb}} # [[always]] #: {{ux|hrx|Du machst das '''immer'''.|You '''always''' do that.}} #: {{ux|hrx|Es is '''immer''' so.|It's '''always''' like this.}} #: {{ux|hrx|Sie nemmd '''immer''' eere grose Tasch mit.|She '''always''' takes her big purse with her.}} ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary] ---- ==Middle Dutch== ===Adverb=== {{dum-adv}} # {{alternative form of|dum|emmer}}
